00123 // Exception class
00124 
00125 class SocketError {
00126 public:
00127         SocketError(ERROR_CODE e)
00128         : error(e) {}
00129 
00130         ERROR_CODE error;
00131 
00132         std::string what() {
00133                 if(error == SOCKET_CREATION_FAILED)
00134                         return std::string("Socket creation failed");;
00135                 if(error == UNKNOWN_HOST)
00136                         return std::string("Unknown Host");
00137                 if(error == CONNECTION_PROBLEM)
00138                         return std::string("A Problem occured while trying to handle a connection");
00139                 return std::string("");
00140         }
00141 };
